about_the_game:
Fantasy Shop Simulator is a fun first-person simulation where you become the manager of your very own fantasy weapon shop!

Play solo or join forces with friends online to expand your shop, attract adventurers, and create the ultimate marketplace for heroes and treasure hunters! 🏰💰

🛒 MANAGE YOUR SHOP

Build your dream fantasy store! Arrange magical weapons, enchanted armor, and rare artifacts to create an immersive shopping experience for every hero who walks through your doors.

🤝 CO-OP GAMEPLAY

Team up with friends online to manage your shop together, divide responsibilities, and strategize to maximize your profits.

📦 ORDER PRODUCTS

Stock your shop with legendary swords, mystical staffs, protective shields, and potions that every adventurer needs before setting off on their next quest.

🎨 CUSTOMIZATION

Transform your store into a legendary merchant’s haven! Choose your shop’s theme, customize the layout, and decorate it with banners, torches, and mystical relics.

🎉 EVENTS AND QUESTS

Host special events like weapon forging contests, rare artifact auctions, and limited-time sales to attract legendary adventurers and boost your reputation.

📈  GROW

Expand your shop, upgrade its decor, and adapt to the ever-changing demands of heroes and treasure seekers to stay ahead in the fantasy market.

In Fantasy Shop Simulator, your choices shape your success. Can you turn a small merchant stall into the most renowned shop in the realm? From the creators of Tavern Manager Simulator! ⚔️🏰💰

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
